title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.7 - General terminal charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.7 - General terminal charges

State Regulations
(a) For each aircraft arriving at the International Arrivals Building............$37.50
(b) For each
passenger arriving at the International Arrivals Building............$1.75

Such charge shall not be payable in connection with
aircraft using the ramps adjacent to such buildings merely to pick up or
deliver passengers embarking upon or disembarking from flights of the airlines
using such buildings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
